thread.title: BRIEF-Hongdou Industrial's Controlling Shareholder And Parties Acting In Concert To Boost Shareholdings

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hongdou Industrial's Controlling Shareholder And Parties Acting In Concert To Boost Shareholdings

organizations.name: reuters) - jiangsu hongdou industrial co ltd

text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Jiangsu Hongdou Industrial Co Ltd :
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER AND PARTIES ACTING IN CONCERT PLAN TO INCREASE SHAREHOLDINGS IN THE COMPANY BY 1-2 PERCENT WITHIN 12 MONTHS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2m8STX5 Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
